title: [RESOLVED] Connection Issues - 11 / 4 / 2016 @ 12:20pm AEST
body:
**Update @ 12:55pm**  The disconnect was caused by a routing configuration change which did not work.  We've since reverted the change and all connectivity should be back to normal.  Loss prevented was briefly enabled while we were ensuring everything was stable again.

Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience and have a great day!


**Original Post**

Hi all,

We've just seen a brief network issue that affected some players in game.  We're looking into it and will keep you updated as info comes to light.

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: whats with the massive client lag ?
who do i kill for 15 - 0 game that i got kick out of
Another glitch on the oce server, love it.
whole team disconnected, enemy team was unaffected. glad it was loss prevented but ruined a game that would have only been ruined by a toxic yi

Thank you for the Loss Prevention! I disconnected and so did our jungle. 

(: (:
